roleset.name: transfer genes of a hybrid back into one of the originating species by backbreeding

role.descr: mention of the other species involved in the hybrid, if separate from arg1

example.name: introgress-v
example.text: For example , to map the mos ( modifiers of snc1 ) mutants , we introgressed the original snc1 mutation ( from Col ) into the Ler ecotype ( named Ler - snc1 ) through repetitive back - crossing with Ler , and selection of snc1 homozygous plants in the F2 ( 5 ) .

propbank.arg: the original snc1 mutation ( from Col )
into the Ler ecotype ( named Ler - snc1 )
through repetitive back - crossing with Ler , and selection of snc1 homozygous plants in the F2

roleset.note: INTROGRESS-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
